ComicInfo.Title: A Mysterious Destination!
ComicInfo.Writer: Davide Goy,Mirka Andolfo,David Goy,Mirka Andolfo,David Goy
ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC!
The gang finally reaches an underwater laboratory, and everything seems to turn out okay. They are closer to Pam. But the threats are not over yet, and Pam could be out of reach...It was already obvious this is not a happy-ending story, right?

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrea Broccardo,Andrea Meloni,Mirka Andolfo,Rafael Albuquerque,Ricardo Lopez Ortiz
